data.name: Message
data.value: It looks like you aren't connected to the internet. The latest saved course information is still available, but some features, such as purchasing or enrolling in a course, will be ready once you're back online.

data.name: ListItem1
data.value: Browse courses and articles you opened earlier.

data.name: ListItem2
data.value: We'll submit completed forms automatically as soon as you're online.

data.name: ListItem3
data.value: For the full experience, try refreshing the page after your connection is restored.
